description: Dive into "Romantic Escapes in Marbella's Embrace" ‚Äî a handpicked list of places with quick notes, links, and essentials for fast trip planning and discovery.
title: Romantic Escapes in Marbella's Embrace

places.generalDescription: Origen Asador Argentino, located on Gregorio Maranon s/n esquina, Calle Camilo Jose Cela, is a haven for meat enthusiasts. Specializing in a variety of carefully selected and aged meats, the restaurant uses almond, olive, and holm oak embers to cook them to perfection. Whether grilling on an open flame or in a charcoal oven, they employ different techniques and temperatures to ensure the best texture and flavor.

sources.snippet: Origen, located in the centre of Marbella, near Frank's Corner is a fairly new restaurant, but it has definitely creeped up in my favorite restaurant list quickly. The welcoming warmth of the interiors, stunning wood and leather features, open wood fire and of course their incredible Steaks makes the perfect place to Steak care of the one you love this Valentines!. www.facebook.com/OrigenHP/
sources.shortName: Most Romantic Restaurants in Marbella

places.name: Origen Asador Argentino

reviews.text: Absolutely recommend it! It's not my first time to be here, but first time to try the lunch menu! So good! Only 28 euros and so many great choices and even a drink ( beer, wine, juice) to chose from. Service is really nice and they help to suggest you the best! Meat is fresh, well prepared and, frankly one of the best places to go for a steak in all Marbella...

Service is excellent, friendly and professional. A pleasure to be served by people who clearly know their job, not something that should be taken for granted on the Costa del Sol! The quality of meat and sausages and their preparation is second to none. I will most definitely be eating here again! And remember, quality does not come cheap!!

The best Argentinian we've ever been to & we've been to a lot! Just fantastic food, from the starters, mains and desserts. The staff are friendly and knowledgeable of the menu. Make sure you book online before you want to go as it's always busy and leave enough time to try and park the car.
Our new favourite restaurant üòä

places.address: Calle Gregorio Mara√±√≥n s/n esquina, C. Camilo Jos√© Cela, 29601 Marbella, M√°laga, Spain

places.generalDescription: La Ca√±ada Shopping is an indoor mall with modern architecture and a wide variety of shops, restaurants, and a cinema. It has become a central part of the Marbella retail experience, offering leisure activities for both residents and visitors. The mall features diverse dining options ranging from American fast food to traditional Spanish tapas. It houses major stores like Apple and FNAC, offering electronic equipment, books, CDs, and more.

sources.snippet: Venturing into the Heart of History: Discover the Charming Shoppes of Marbella‚Äôs Old Town We are fervent believers in the magic of retail therapy, and there‚Äôs something enchanting about walking into a boutique and coming out with something unique, something that tells a story. For us, shopping isn‚Äôt just about acquiring new things.
sources.shortName: Valentine's Day in Marbella: A Romantic Guide

sources.snippet: While you can enjoy amazing window displays throughout the locality, if you want to find the most competitive prices for the coolest items, you must visit La Ca√±ada. The shopping centre has around 300 shops, restaurants, cafes, bars and one cinema.
sources.shortName: 50 things to see and do in Marbella, Costa del Sol

places.name: La Ca√±ada Shopping

reviews.text:
La Ca√±ada Shopping Centre is an absolute gem in Marbella, offering a perfect blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment. From the moment you arrive, you'll appreciate the modern design and spacious layout that makes exploring the centre a breeze.

Now I made the mistake of taking my wife and two daughters there. Hours later, they were ready to leave.

With over 150 shops, there's something for everyone. Whether you're looking for high-street fashion, luxury brands, or unique local boutiques, you can find it all here. Popular stores like Zara, H&M, and Mango sit alongside specialty shops that showcase local artisans, providing a diverse shopping experience. It's a great place to pick up souvenirs or treat yourself to something special!

In addition to shopping, La Ca√±ada has an impressive selection of dining options. From casual cafes to more upscale restaurants, you can enjoy a variety of cuisines. Take a break from shopping and indulge in some delicious tapas or grab a coffee and pastry to recharge.

For entertainment, the shopping centre features a multi-screen cinema that shows the latest films, making it a great option for a fun outing, especially on rainy days. There's also a play area for children, so families can enjoy their time together while the kids have.

Overall, La Ca√±ada Shopping Centre is a must-visit destination for anyone in Marbella. It combines shopping, dining, and entertainment in one location, making it the perfect spot for a day out with friends or family. You won't be disappointed.

La Ca√±ada in Marbella is an absolutely fantastic shopping center! From the moment you arrive, you're greeted by ample, free parking, surrounded by beautiful palm trees, setting a wonderfully relaxed tone. Once inside, you'll discover a truly impressive array of shops ‚Äì literally everything you could possibly need, from fashion and electronics to homeware and groceries. It's a very nice mall with a great atmosphere, making it a perfect spot to spend a few hours Browse or ticking off your shopping list. Highly recommend!
Huge mall with every store you could want.  Great food court.  Very busy all week, closed on Sunday's.

places.address: Carretera Oj√©n, s/n, 29603 Marbella, M√°laga, Spain

places.generalDescription: Cabopino Beach is a spacious and popular destination in Marbella, offering a variety of activities for visitors. The beach features dunes, nearby restaurants, water sports, swimming areas, and a bustling nudist section. Additionally, the area boasts an array of leisure facilities including restaurants, shops with international fashion brands and luxury items. This part of Marbella offers 26 kilometers of coastline with modern hotels, residential developments, shops and restaurants.

sources.shortName: Marbella luxury: Plan a romantic getaway to Spain‚Äôs most glamorous city

places.name: Cabopino Beach

reviews.text: Beautiful day in January with 17C weather, stunning colors and fresh breeze from the sea. If you enjoy walking on the beach, next to big sand dunes, this is your place.
It's a great beach! I love the nudist part most because it makes me feel very blessed that I don't have a small chode like most other men.

A bit underwhelming, water is clean and the beach is sandy but the black sand made the entire sea look grayish and not blue. But overall a good beach. Beware of high waves and nude people because these were not clear in the reviews.

places.address: Spain

places.generalDescription: Ta-Kumi is a Japanese restaurant in Marbella where culture and fusion cuisine come together under the guidance of renowned chefs Toshio Tsutsui and Alvaro Arbeloa. The minimalist Oriental decor exudes elegance, reflecting the sophistication of its dishes. With a focus on using top-quality ingredients, the menu features a variety of sushi, sashimi, teppanyaki, tempura, and fusion creations that blend Mediterranean and Japanese flavors.

sources.snippet: When you go, try Japanese cooking at Ta-Kumi, get local Andalusian cuisine at places like Lobito de Mar and Bibo (both by chef Dani Garc√≠a) or snag a table at the famous two-Michelin-starred Skina, by Marcos Granda.
sources.shortName: Marbella luxury: Plan a romantic getaway to Spain‚Äôs most glamorous city

sources.snippet: Savour the taste of perfection at Ta-Kumi Marbella - book your table now for an unforgettable culinary experience that blends the flavours of Japan and the Mediterranean. Now open, Closing at 23:00
sources.shortName: Valentine's Day in Marbella: A Romantic Guide

places.name: Ta-Kumi | Restaurante Japon√©s - Marbella

reviews.text:
Japanese cuisine at finest world level.
Sushi of amazing quality, and if you never tried sak√© with your sushi, you should try it, the staff will recommend you high quality sak√© in every price range. It‚Äòs always a pleasure to meet the chef Alvaro Arbeloa, a maestro of fine japanese dining. For over 10 years every trip to Marbella includes a visit (or 2) at Takumi

We arrived without a reservation and we were overwhelmed by the welcoming service. The sushi especially was exceptional, best in Marbella for sure! Also the other dishes like the noodles and gyoza did a good job. The dessert menu was not the best, but other than that was a lovely evening for the family.

I stumbled upon this gem after it was recommended to me while searching for a great Japanese spot in Marbella and it went beyond all my expectations! We were three people and all agreed: everything was perfect, from the incredibly kind service (they even found us a table without a reservation!) to the flawless quality of the food. We ordered a bit of everything, and every single dish was amazing but the anchovy nigiri was my absolute favorite, just wow! Huge thanks to the wonderful team Christophe, Cristian, Xorche, the sweetest hostess, and the lovely manager. You truly made our night!

places.address: C. Gregorio Mara√±√≥n, 4, 29602 Marbella, M√°laga, Spain

places.generalDescription: Trocadero Arena in Marbella is a stunning beachfront destination that combines the relaxed ambiance of a traditional Spanish chiringuito with the exotic charm of an African colonial-style beach club. This family-friendly spot offers a diverse menu featuring fresh seafood, succulent meats, and various vegetarian options crafted from high-quality ingredients. Situated on Rio Real Beach, it provides a unique dining experience with its exceptional decor by Lorenzo Queipo de Llano.

sources.snippet: Trocadero Arena is a lovely romantic seaside restaurant in Marbella, located in the R√≠o Real beach area. Exquisitely decorated by Lorenzo Queipo de Llano, it has a cool safari look, but it's still very chic and intimate. Its culinary options are based on ingredients with a prominent Mediterranean touch, but in this case also enhanced by significant Asian influences.
sources.shortName: Most Romantic Restaurants in Marbella

sources.snippet: Experience exceptional Mediterranean cuisine, soak up the sun, and enjoy stunning views of the sea at Trocadero Arena - the perfect beachfront destination. Now open, Closing at 01:00
sources.shortName: Valentine's Day in Marbella: A Romantic Guide

places.name: Trocadero Arena

reviews.text:
We loved the spot. We started with juice and water in the "lounge" and moved for lunch onto the terrace. The view to the sea was a great.
The food was also great and the service too. We had seafood and liked it a lot.
Reading the other reviews: yes, it is not a cheap place, but our service was great.

Such a lovely beach bar where you can sit and relax and watch the sea.
The Trocadero Arena beach restaurant is a really nice place. It has a lot of beach beds for you to sit down on and the restaurant has the same Excellent food and service as with all the Trocadero restaurants in Malaga and Marbella.

The staff are very well and I'm very friendly here. The service is amazing bringing everything to your table. The beaches are kept very clean and the sand is really nice here.
Great food and great service, and lovely location at the beach. Recommended to book in advance, though we got a table at drop-in.

places.address: Playa de R√≠o Real Carretera N340 km 186, 29600 Marbella, M√°laga, Spain

places.generalDescription: Puerto Ban√∫s is a charming town on the Malaga coast, offering a wonderful climate, beautiful beaches, and excellent sports facilities. The iconic marina attracts some of the world's largest and most luxurious yachts each year. Surrounded by exclusive developments, it features a select leisure area with high-end restaurants, shops offering major international fashion brands, and luxury items.

sources.snippet: There is nowhere quite like Puerto Banus if you want to eat, drink and be merry. Saunter around the Marina, which is lined with lively bars and fresh fish restaurants. Enjoy a drink in one of the waterside terraces and stroll round to where the big boats are at the western end of the Marina.
sources.shortName: 5 romantic things to do in Marbella

sources.snippet: Puerto Banus: If you‚Äôre looking for a glamorous proposal, Puerto Banus is the perfect spot. Known for its luxury yachts and high-end boutiques, this marina is a stunning location to propose to your partner. Take a stroll along the water and surprise your partner with the ring.
sources.shortName: Unique proposal locations & proposal package in Marbella

sources.snippet: We are sure that after the walk, you will enjoy even more of Puerto Banus, one of the symbols of the city and its luxuries. We recommend that you put on comfortable footwear. Get ready to walk a total of 7 kilometres.
sources.shortName: 50 things to see and do in Marbella, Costa del Sol

sources.snippet: Playa de Puerto Ban√∫s: This beach is located in the exclusive Puerto Ban√∫s marina and is a great place to people-watch and enjoy the atmosphere.
sources.shortName: Things To Do in Marbella for Couples

places.name: Puerto Ban√∫s

reviews.text:
Wow what a amazing place, nice cars, Nice boats, Nice restaurants and Bars,
This  is the place to see and visit if you are heading to Spain.
Food, location, Atmosphere everything was perfect for a day or 2!! Lol

Take a look at how the other half live! Plenty of swanky boutiques and luxury yachts make this the Costa del Sol's answer to Monaco. We had a pleasant stroll soaking it all in before following the coast in a pleasant walk to Marbella.
Just speechless. Everything a vacay place can offer. From beaches to clubs. From shopping to restaurants.. an amazing place to have a leisurely holiday‚Ä¶

places.address: Spain

sources.snippet: Indulge in the finest Argentinean-style barbecue at Asador Tehuelche in Estepona, where meat lovers' dreams come true. Now open, Closing at 23:30
sources.shortName: Valentine's Day in Marbella: A Romantic Guide

places.name: Asador Tehuelche Grill Argentino. Carnes a la Brasa. Parrilla Argentina.

reviews.text:
The terrace seating is absolutely stunning, such a beautiful spot to dine. The service was exceptional; special thanks to Sebastian for making our experience truly memorable.
The food was fresh, full of flavor, and beautifully presented. Even our vegetarian friend was impressed with her meal. The stuffed red peppers are a must-try, packed with flavor and absolutely delicious!

Staying with friends and decided to thank them by taking them out for meal. They recommend it here. We had sausage & black pudding as starter. Presentation of both Very poor, sausage slithers in a bowl with no real taste, b pudding was nice again severed in a small bowl. No Presentation at all. We ordered the chicken with cheese and tomato top. When it arrived, it looked like a pizza. (See photo) The chicken was well cooked, but the excess cheese, tomato puree & ham topping were far too much. We ordered roast vegetables again in a small bowl, very oilly and not tender. Overall, it was a disappointing meal for us. Our friends enjoyed their stake meals. Presentation 4/10 food 4/10  atmosphere 4/10 as stuck in corner of balcony overlooking a barron alotment.
Puddings 10/10 wine üç∑ üòã üëå

My friend and I had the best experience last night at this wonderful restaurant.
The staff were attentive and friendly and the steak was the best I'd had in a very long time. It was cooked to perfection and tasted amazing.  The atmosphere was incredible,  with everything representing a first class dinning night out. Thank you everyone, we will definitely be back!

places.address: km. 1,5, Ctra. Benahav√≠s, 29688 Estepona, M√°laga, Spain

places.generalDescription: Restaurante El Lago Marbella is a Michelin-starred gem located in the picturesque Greenlife golf course in Elviria. The restaurant offers a stunning backdrop of the Elvira Hills and a serene lake, making it an ideal setting for a memorable dining experience. Known for its innovative and creative dishes, this establishment has contributed significantly to the culinary scene of Costa del Sol.

sources.snippet: Located in the tranquil setting of Greenlife Golf, El Lago is not just a restaurant; it's an experience. With a Michelin star to its name, El Lago offers an intimate atmosphere complemented by views over a beautiful lake. The restaurant prides itself on its innovative Andalusian cuisine, prepared with locally sourced ingredients.
sources.shortName: Local Guide: Top romantic dining experiences for the Valentine's in Marbella

places.name: Restaurante El Lago Marbella

reviews.text:
El Lago has a fantastic and tranquil location by a lake and a golf course. The entire dining experience was decent with a variety of a la carte dishes to choose from.

The dry aged entrec√¥te was my favorite dish and I had it accompanied by some mashed potatoes. Both were incredible and definitely worth the visit.

While the atmosphere was peaceful, it was a bit too quiet and awkward at times, since there were no other visitors besides my table during my visit. That said, I suggest booking at a later hour when most of the other visitors start to arrive.

Very good when do you like service and food.

The Price is ‚Ç¨‚Ç¨‚Ç¨.
Very good food. Very busy make sure to reserve table. Orherwise nice Staff and a Lovely view. A bit of sand in the Shells in the paella. Otherwise very reccomended.

places.address: Av. Marco Polo, 29604 Marbella, M√°laga, Spain

places.generalDescription: Nestled in a serene setting amidst lush green gardens and mesmerizing waterfalls, Cascada Cocina & Bar provides a romantic escape from the hustle and bustle of downtown Marbella. The restaurant's laid-back and welcoming ambiance features stylish terracotta and teal hues, minimalist furnishings, and a large wood fire for cooler days.

sources.snippet: Nestled within a lush setting where mesmerising waterfalls dance to the music of nature and a colourful array of botanical beauty blooms in the fullness of its glory, Cascada Cocina Bar offers a sublime sanctuary for love-struck souls. This romantic retreat offers a place where ardour and affection find their most profound expressions, flourishing amidst the hushed whispers of nature's best-kept secrets. Instagram @cascadamarbella
sources.shortName: (Tip) The most Romantic Restaurants in Marbella 2025

places.name: Cascada Cocina & Bar

reviews.text: Sometimes restaurants just get it right and this is one of them. From the moment you walk into the room you get the feeling that everyone is having a great time. That vibe comes from the excellent service, excitingly different dishes, live music and that invisible magic ingredient that restaurants strive to find. Will definitely return and maybe see you there as well. Just don't take my reservation üòÖ

Beautiful restaurant with outdoor seating. Food was delicious, we had lubina, goat leg, grilled leeks and a salad. The sauce with the lubina was amazing and the goat meat was so tender and seasoned. Grilled leeks with the pistachio was a good combination. Salad was a little underwhelming compared to the other dishes.

Inexpensive for such great service, great food and incredible wine. Beautiful setting and location on the Patio. We always judge restaurant by their croquettes and how much love we think goes into them.... these were up there with the best!

places.address: Urb Montua, 39, 29602 Marbella, M√°laga, Spain

places.generalDescription: LE√ëA is a renowned restaurant located in Marbella, part of the Puente Romano Beach Resort. The restaurant offers alfresco dining and is known for its wood-fired grills where locally sourced meat, seafood, and seasonal vegetables are cooked to perfection. The menu features a variety of bold and innovative dishes created by one of Spain's most talented chefs.

sources.snippet: The exquisite Dani Garc √≠a Steakhouse in Puente Romano is all about the meat, offering the perfect balance between product and technique. Setting this restaurant above others is the cooking of meat over hot embers, which really draw out the flavours and add a touch of sultry smoke to the chef‚Äôs high-class cosmopolitan repertoire. Expect vegetable starters, yakipinchos, flame-grill and chargrilled favourites, followed up with desserts that make you forget about the world.
sources.siteName: BRIGHT. | Brilliant ideas for better living
sources.shortName: Marbella‚Äôs top 5 venues to celebrate Valentine‚Äôs day in style

sources.snippet: 9.2 / 10 LE√ëA Marbella Welcome to LE√ëA, the upscale restaurant located in the heart of Puente Romano Beach Resort. This trendy eatery offers exquisite cuisine, exceptional ambiance, and excellent facilities that make it one of the best dining experiences in the Marbella and Puerto Ban√∫s area. Owned by renowned chef Dani Garc√≠a, LE√ëA is [‚Ä¶]
sources.shortName: (Tip) The most Romantic Restaurants in Marbella 2025

places.name: LE√ëA

reviews.text:
We had lunch there and it was amazing!
-We ordered starters like grilled edamame (10/10) and grilled avocado (10/10) - both were perfect.
-We tried their Michelin-star burger, which I found a bit average (7/10).
-The steak was absolutely amazing (10/10).
-And the dessert‚Ä¶ wow! I couldn't stop eating, it was so delicious.

The service was nice, the ambience was great, and everything was just perfect. We paid ‚Ç¨260.

Went to the restaurant last weekend with my wife and son for Mother's Day. I've been here once before a few years ago and had mentioned that the steak knives weren't very sharp - and sadly, nothing's changed. Trying to cut through a Tomahawk steak with a blunt knife isn't much fun. Might actually bring my own next time!

I asked for the steak medium, but it came out rare and got cold fast. Staff were friendly, but no one came around during the meal to check if we wanted more bread, butter, or drinks, which was a bit disappointing.

One nice touch though - the hostess brought my wife some flowers for Mother's Day. That was sweet and definitely appreciated. Overall though, the whole experience felt pretty average.

The food is almost good . Very particular that on saturaday night at 9PM not available 2 best seller desserts . The ambient is nice but when you book you have 2 hours stay and the weiter remember you every 15 minutes the ending tike of the slot . So very uncomfortable. 2 deserts in the list of 6 not available. Orders a flambe pinapple that was tasting horrible . We just left 3/4 of it and the weiter didn't ask I maybe we didn't like it or was not good .  The price of the wine on the wine list was lower respect the price we paid.

places.address: Hotel Puente Romano, Av. Bulevar Pr√≠ncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe, s/n, 29602 Marbella, M√°laga, Spain

places.generalDescription: Nestled within the stunning Puente Romano Beach Resort, Sea Grill is a culinary treasure that captures the spirit of Mediterranean living. This stylish venue boasts a beautiful seafront terrace where guests can enjoy everything from delightful tapas and fresh salads to upscale seafood dishes. The atmosphere here transitions seamlessly from sunlit breakfasts to leisurely lunches, culminating in enchanting dinners under a starlit sky.

sources.snippet: Enjoy a taste of local, Mediterranean seafood with a glass of champagne as you watch the waves at the 5* Resort of Puente Romano's Sea Grill restaurant. On yheir outdoor decking, you can embrace the natural surroundings of the palm-fringed promenade showcasing the impressive mountainous backdrop of La Concha. Sea Grill boasts breathtaking views of the beach and, even if you decide to dine inside, our floor to ceiling glass walls will allow you to enjoy your meal with unrestricted views of the seascape.
sources.shortName: Most Romantic Restaurants in Marbella

places.name: Sea Grill

reviews.text:
Sea Grill at Puente Romano is simply a feast for the senses. From the moment you step in, you're greeted with breathtaking views of the Mediterranean-waves gently crashing, the golden sunset painting the sky, and the soft melody of live music setting the perfect mood. It's an atmosphere that effortlessly blends sophistication with relaxation.

Service? It's good-not mind-blowing, but efficient and polite. The real magic, however, lies in the food. Every bite is pure indulgence. From the freshest seafood to perfectly cooked meats, the menu caters to every taste, ensuring that no one leaves unsatisfied. Each dish is prepared with precision, balancing flavors that melt in your mouth.

Is it cheap? Absolutely not. But class and quality come at a price, and here, it's worth every cent. This isn't just a meal-it's an experience. An elegant, mouthwatering, can't-stop-thinking-about-it kind of experience.

If you're looking for a place that delivers on all fronts-views, ambiance, service, and most importantly, exquisite cuisine-Sea Grill is it. Utter perfection. The kind of place where, by the end of the night, you're practically licking your fingers, wondering why life can't always taste this good.

Mediocre ambiance with first world prices. Just pathetic. Food not well presented, tasteless mostly and all the place kind of makeshift. A true lack of style for someone like me, traveling the world. This was my second and last time.
Ah. The views of a dirty beach panorama in the midst of a bunch of Nouveaux Riches completed perfectly a setting without any class‚Ä¶

The food remains exceptional year on year. During the day the setting is good, when you do remember the pool does partner a hotel pool. On a night however, it's next level. The music is brilliant, sometimes strings live, relaxing.
The service on a night couldn't be better, during the day, just off top notch slightly .

Amazing .

places.address: Bulevar Principe Alfonso von Hohenlohe, s/n, 29602 Marbella, M√°laga, Spain

places.generalDescription: Casa Tua Restaurant Marbella is a culinary gem in the heart of Marbella, offering an enchanting experience with its masterful display of Italian cuisine. This small yet gourmet venue in Marbella's old town boasts a terrace where guests can enjoy a relaxed atmosphere while savoring authentic Italian flavors. The menu features mouthwatering homemade pastas, luscious risottos, and freshly caught fish prepared using traditional Italian techniques.

sources.snippet: Casa Tua Restaurant in Marbella, ran by a husband and wife duo, serves the finest in Italian cuisine, using the freshest seasonal ingredients with contemporary twists and elegant presentation. The menu was created to encompass the Mediterranean environment we all love and enjoy here in Marbella but inspired by worldwide cuisine and chef Adriano's global experience.
sources.shortName: Best Restaurants for a Romantic Dinner for 2 in Marbella

sources.snippet: Tucked away in the heart of Marbella's Old Town, it is an idyllic retreat for those looking to escape the hustle and bustle of the city. Encapsulating the essence of a rustic Italian romance, the restaurant immediately transports its visitors to the quaint, cobblestoned streets of a small Italian restaurant.
sources.shortName: (Tip) The most Romantic Restaurants in Marbella 2025

places.name: Casa tua Restaurant Marbella

reviews.text:
We had a very nice evening there. Service was excellent, the lobster pasta was super yummy and it was a big portion as well. Seabass was also good!
The atmosphere and vibe definitely added to a great evening. Would definitely recommend if u want to enjoy a fancy dinner which is worth the money!

Absolutely top class , The  food is amazing as is the service. We always book our table before we even get on the plane. The Rack of lamb is incredible and is my usual order. My wife loves the Tuna with homemade pasta. They now have a beautiful wine bar next door , it's called Casa Tua wine bar. A great spot to start and finish off the night..Congrats to the owners and all the staff. See you soon..

Genuine Italian restaurant in the heart of Marbella. We had a table of 8 and every dish we got was exquisite. One of, if not the best, meal I've ever had. Great atmosphere and staff were so friendly. The Casa Tua wine bar owned by the same family just up the street is the perfect spot for post dinner drinks.
10/10 would recommend to a friend.

places.address: C. Virgen del Pilar, 17, 29602 Marbella, M√°laga, Spain

places.generalDescription: BiBo Dani Garc√≠a is a renowned restaurant located in Puente Romano, known for its glamorous and innovative dining experience. Run by the talented chef Dani Garcia, the restaurant offers bold and playful menus featuring dishes like glazed crispy chicken & giant sea urchin and wild mushrooms from the Ronda Mountains. The service at BiBo Dani Garc√≠a is top-notch, reflecting the high-class atmosphere of the establishment.

sources.snippet: When you go, try Japanese cooking at Ta-Kumi, get local Andalusian cuisine at places like Lobito de Mar and Bibo (both by chef Dani Garc√≠a) or snag a table at the famous two-Michelin-starred Skina, by Marcos Granda.
sources.shortName: Marbella luxury: Plan a romantic getaway to Spain‚Äôs most glamorous city

places.name: BIBO SUPPERCLUB

reviews.text: Such an amazing restaurant. The food was spectacular. The wait wasn't long either. My favorite was the iberico and ceviche. The brisket buns were special too. The service was great and helpful. We sat next to a nice dj playing chill house music. I loved it and would definitely come back.

Majority of the food was great, except for the main course which was way too salty. Dancer and the music were nice but loud, which made it impossible to hear the people you converse with. It is a nice place to have fun night out but not how a pleasant and calm dinner.

We had a really fantastic evening at Bibo. The food was very good, we ate ceviche, croquettes, lasagne, chicken with morels, roasted cod, rice pudding, mash, vegetables. Every dish was well made and tasty. I would highly recommend the food. The room is beautiful the entertainment was great fun and really added to the atmosphere. We sat outside then for cocktails after the meal. All in all a really enjoyable night and I felt for the food, atmosphere, location and beautiful surroundings it was value for money.

places.address: Hotel Puente Romano, Av. Bulevar Pr√≠ncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe, s/n, 29602 Marbella, M√°laga, Spain

places.generalDescription: Ocean Club Marbella is a renowned beach club located in Puerto Banus, offering a sprawling 9000m2 of luxurious surroundings. The centerpiece is its saltwater swimming pool surrounded by large sun loungers and blue parasols. With around 100 young service professionals, the venue provides award-winning services and quality. It's the ultimate spot for chilling out with friends, featuring a large pool and great music.

sources.snippet: For a more relaxed yet stylish atmosphere, head to beach clubs like Ocean Club Marbella or Trocadero Playa, where you can enjoy cocktails by the sea while listening to great music. Whether you‚Äôre after a chic night out or a lively dance floor, Marbella has something for everyone.
sources.shortName: Marbella for Couples: romantic getaways in the heart of Costa del Sol

places.name: Ocean Club Marbella

reviews.text: Ocean Club Marbella is an amazing place to spend the day - the vibe is super chill, the environment stylish yet relaxed, and the service was spot on. The food was absolutely delicious, fresh and well-prepared. We had 6 liters of ros√© wine and 2 bottles of champagne - everything was top quality and served perfectly chilled. The whole experience felt luxurious without being too formal. Great music, beautiful setting, and the perfect spot to enjoy the Marbella sun with friends. Definitely one of the best beach clubs on the coast!

Food and drinks were decent, it's priced as you would expect in this part of Spain at a Beach Club.

Service started out a bit slow, but picked up after the first drink and they found us a table as walk-ins.

Wash rooms and the venue in general is very nice and well maintained with friendly staff.

This place is very kid friendly, which may be a positive for some, but personally I don't want to pay ‚Ç¨250+ for a bed and have screaming children running around.

Stylish, super clean, and very well organized. You don't choose your bed ‚Äì the staff assigns it, which actually keeps things flowing smoothly. Service was excellent all day, the crowd a relaxed and slightly older mix (35+), and the music stayed pleasantly in the background.

One thing that surprised us a bit: there were quite a few families with small kids around ‚Äì not exactly what you'd expect at a beach club vibe-wise, but still fine.

Another note: on windy days, umbrellas stay closed unless guests explicitly take the risk ‚Äì which makes sense, but it's good to know in advance.

Big plus: you can stay until 9 PM and really enjoy a full beach day.

places.address: Av. de Lola Flores, s/n, Nueva Andaluc√≠a, 29660 Marbella, M√°laga, Spain

places.generalDescription: Trocadero Playa is a chic beach bar and restaurant located just a five-minute walk from the sea, offering a perfect escape during the summer months and even on sunny winter days. With its exotic decor, al fresco tables on the sand, and friendly staff, it has been a beloved spot for almost 15 years. The restaurant exudes glamour and sophistication with VIP loungers and sleek design.

sources.snippet: For a more relaxed yet stylish atmosphere, head to beach clubs like Ocean Club Marbella or Trocadero Playa, where you can enjoy cocktails by the sea while listening to great music. Whether you‚Äôre after a chic night out or a lively dance floor, Marbella has something for everyone.
sources.shortName: Marbella for Couples: romantic getaways in the heart of Costa del Sol

places.name: Trocadero Playa

reviews.text: An old classy restaurant by the sea with great cuban music. We had the seafood paella, croquetas as a starter are fantastic, service was great and efficient, table on the beach the perfect day.

Very good location, service was good and super friendly. The food was good too.

We came back for a second meal and the food was equally as good long with the service.

We definitely recommend this place to others.

They re very child friendly too which is always nice.

The beach is beautiful and the location is excellent. However, the service was disappointing. The staff on the beach did not provide proper attention - no water or drinks were offered, and we had to walk to the restaurant every time we wanted to order something. In addition, there were no towels available, even though the beach was practically empty. We could easily have spent three times more on food and drinks if the service had been better, which is truly a shame. It seems the beach area may need better management or supervision to ensure guests are properly taken care of.

places.address: Playa de Santa Petronila, 29610 Marbella, M√°laga, Spain

places.generalDescription: Lobito de Mar Marbella is a trendy and multi-room restaurant known for its Andalusian seafood, rice dishes, tapas, and cocktails. It's the brainchild of Dani Garcia, a renowned Michelin-star chef celebrated for his culinary creativity. The restaurant offers a modern Italian dining experience infused with fresh ingredients and passion.

sources.snippet: Treat you and your special someone to a romantic weekend in a stunning hotel!. Marbella is filled with a sea of top-level luxury hotels, including Anantara Villa Padierna Palace (which is inspired by the Tuscan landscape and has a 2,000-square-metre wellness centre), the indulgent Puente Romano Beach Resort Marbella (which has stunning pools you won‚Äôt want to leave) and the seafront Gran Meli√° Don Pepe (which looks out onto Sierra de las Nieves Natural Park). Designed with relaxation in mind, Marbella is home to 20+ spas, spa hotels and thalassotherapy centres where you can take care of yourself from the inside, out.
sources.shortName: Marbella luxury: Plan a romantic getaway to Spain‚Äôs most glamorous city

sources.snippet: Experience the taste of the sea at its finest with LoBito de Mar - the ultimate seafood dining destination. Come indulge in our fresh and exquisite seafood dishes, served in a warm and inviting ambiance, and leave with an unforgettable culinary experience. Now open, Closing at 23:00
sources.shortName: Valentine's Day in Marbella: A Romantic Guide

places.name: Lobito de Mar Marbella. El bar resalao de Dani Garc√≠a

reviews.text: We had a delicious lunch there and would definitely go back to try more dishes! We ordered an omelet and a seafood rice to share. Great portion sizes and flavors. We also wanted to order the guac but it was too much food for us already. May be next time!

My husband and I found this wee gem because the Asador was closed and we kept
walking‚Ä¶ what a stroke of luck! Half way through our meal we said, ‚Äúthis has to be a 5 star by everyone!!‚Äù, it is INCREDIBLE! Service
and food is 10/10! We loved it so much we're going back tomorrow as it's our last day! This is the best we've been to in Marbella in years. Love it! A must for anyone who appreciates good food :)

Lobito de Mar was good. The anchovies with charcoal butter were salty and smoky with a soft texture. The tuna carpaccio was very thin and fresh. It was made from the best parts of the tuna and you can really tell. The octopus noodles with black ink had a strong rich taste and looked cool too. The hippo ice cream dessert was fun and tasted like something from childhood. This is the second restaurant we try by chef Dani Garcia and he didn't disappoint. Big salute to the chef.

places.address: Av. Bulevar Pr√≠ncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe, 178, 29602 Marbella, M√°laga, Spain

places.generalDescription: Nestled in the picturesque Nueva Andalucia, Magna Caf√© Marbella is a delightful dining destination that combines stunning views with a diverse menu. This charming venue boasts a spacious wrap-around terrace where guests can soak in breathtaking sights of the golf course, Mediterranean Sea, and even Gibraltar. The indoor dining area and lounge bar provide a stylish yet relaxing atmosphere, perfect for enjoying pre or post-dinner drinks.

sources.snippet: Magna Cafe in Nueva Andalucia is a great venue with a large, diverse menu and a tranquil atmosphere. The large wrap around terrace enjoys fantastic views of the golf course, the Mediterranean and Gibraltar, while the indoor dining area and lounge bar, which is perfect for those pre or post dinner drinks, is relaxing and stylish. Magna Cafe is open from 10am for early morning coffees and meeting...
sources.shortName: Best Restaurants for a Romantic Dinner for 2 in Marbella

sources.snippet: Situated next to a golf course in Nueva Andalucia, Magna cafe offers stunning views and excellent cuisine. You can choose to dine indoors or on their beautiful terrace - intimate, elegant, romantic!.
sources.shortName: Most Romantic Restaurants in Marbella

places.name: Magna Caf√© Marbella

reviews.text:
This restaurant is a Tour de Force if you want to celebrate a special occasion.   The food is superb with so many unexpected twists appearing on the plate.  They say, you eat with your eyes, and this is so true here.  If you can pull your eyes from the table the outlook and views of the surrounding countryside and the coast all the way down to Gibraltar are stunning.
I can wholeheartedly recommend this restaurant to the most discerning of foodies.

It's so nice to know what to expect in advance....

Enjoy.....

The caf√© has a very nice vibe, but unfortunately, we reserved a table at 16:00 and it was quite hot. To enjoy it more, I recommend booking after 18:00. We were a large group, and the service was very good. Additionally, there is lots of parking available. The best time to visit is during sunset to fully enjoy the view.

Magna Cafe in Marbella is a beloved dining destination nestled in the heart of Spain's Costa del Sol. With a reputation for both its culinary excellence and stunning vistas, it's a favorite among locals and tourists alike. The restaurant offers a diverse menu that combines traditional Spanish flavors with contemporary Mediterranean cuisine, ensuring there's something to delight every palate.

The ambiance at Magna Cafe is equally appealing, with elegant interiors, a spacious terrace, and panoramic views of the surrounding mountains and sea. Whether you're there for a leisurely lunch, a romantic dinner, or a special event, the exceptional service and warm atmosphere make for a memorable experience.

In addition to its exquisite dining options, Magna Cafe is also known for its vibrant bar scene. Patrons can enjoy expertly crafted cocktails, a curated selection of wines, and the perfect setting to unwind and socialize. With its blend of outstanding food, breathtaking scenery, and welcoming environment, Magna Cafe truly captures the essence of Mediterranean hospitality. üòåüíï

places.address: Av Calder√≥n de la Barca, s/n, Nueva Andaluc√≠a, 29660 Marbella, M√°laga, Spain

places.generalDescription: Breathe, a restaurant, gastrobar, and garden located in the world-famous port of Puerto Banus in Marbella, offers a unique dining experience. With its fresh-thinking gastronomy and sophisticated design, it's an ideal spot for a night out with friends or to celebrate special events.

sources.snippet: Its lush gardens and organic produce set the stage for an intriguing dining experience. You'll be impressed with its modern-urban design and fresh-thinking gastronomic philosophy, perfectly marrying the future with the classical charm of Marbella-Puerto Ba√±√≠s. The restaurant's Valentine's Day special at Soul by BREATHE offers a carefully crafted menu for breakfast, lunch, or dinner, ensuring a romantic and intimate atmosphere with fantastic cocktails, live DJ, and exquisite Mediterranean-inspired cuisine.
sources.shortName: Local Guide: Top romantic dining experiences for the Valentine's in Marbella

sources.snippet: This multifaceted venue certainly hits the mark when it comes to style. A great option for Valentine‚Äôs day, with amazing cocktails and unique menu options. As soon as you walk in you are immersed in a modern-urban design that was made to enhance the natural elements.
sources.siteName: BRIGHT. | Brilliant ideas for better living
sources.shortName: Marbella‚Äôs top 5 venues to celebrate Valentine‚Äôs day in style

places.name: Breathe

reviews.text:
One of must places to go when in Marbella. Great and friendly staff, amazing atmosphere and delicious food.

After our lunchtime at Soul, we were welcomed very warmly by GM Fran and everyone else, enjoyed a lot our night out. It was my birthday and my wife also organized a surprise cake so thank you Fran and all the staff for making the evening really special.

I would definitely recommend everyone to visit Breathe restaurant.

Breathe Marbella is an exceptional dining destination! From the moment you step in, you're enveloped in a stylish yet natural ambiance, like dining in a beautifully designed jungle. The attention to detail in the decor, incorporating elements of earth, fire, air, and water, creates a truly immersive and calming experience.
The menu focuses on fresh, local, and seasonal ingredients, and the quality shines through in every dish. Meat lovers are in for a treat, but even vegetarian options, like the cauliflower dishes, are outstanding and not to be missed. The presentation of the food is also top-notch.
Beyond the exquisite food, the service is impeccable. The staff are attentive, friendly, and professional, making you feel well taken care of throughout your visit.
To top it all off, the rooftop bar offers stunning views and a fantastic vibe, perfect for enjoying expertly crafted cocktails after your meal. While it might be on the pricier side, the overall experience at Breathe Marbella, combining excellent cuisine, a unique atmosphere, and top-tier service, makes it well worth it for a special occasion or a memorable night out in Marbella. I highly recommend Breathe and will definitely be returning!

The food was unfortunately below average and quite overrated in my opinion. While the service was attentive and professional, the overall experience didn't meet my expectations. The atmosphere felt more like a nightclub than a fine dining restaurant, which was not what I was hoping for.

places.address: Nueva Andaluc√≠a, C. los Lirios, s/n, Nueva Andaluc√≠a, 29660 Marbella, M√°laga, Spain

places.generalDescription: Besaya Beach is a hidden gem along Marbella's Golden Mile, offering an exquisite blend of Mediterranean cuisine and a chic beachfront atmosphere. This stylish spot not only serves up delectable seafood dishes like fresh oysters and grilled lobster but also provides a serene escape from the bustling party scene. With its elegant decor, including cozy sofas in the indoor gourmet corner, Besaya Beach creates an inviting ambiance perfect for romantic dinners or leisurely meals with friends.

sources.snippet: Besaya Beach is an International restaurant on Marbella‚Äôs Golden mile with front line sea views and a contemporary vibe open for Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner throughout the year. They also enjoy a small area of Beach Beds directly in front of the restaurant for you to enjoy the sea and sunshine before or after your food. Their specialities certainly lie in their Fish and Seafood dishes w...
sources.shortName: Best Restaurants for a Romantic Dinner for 2 in Marbella

places.name: Besaya Beach

reviews.text:
Amazing place!
Went there for Christmas lunch and everything matched, from start to end. Great service, food, drinks and atmosphere. Will definitely visit some time in summer.

We've been here several times, so we knew we wouldn't be disappointed. In front of the Coral Beach hotel with lovely sea views. We shared a Tuna tartar very fresh and perfectly prepared. We then had the salt baked Sea Bass for 2. Totally delicious and again well filleted at the table. Good wine selection starting from 30‚Ç¨. Service was polite and efficient.

Overall very nice experience. Lovely and very helpful staff, beautiful environment. Tried salmon tartar, black rice with seafood and salmon. I would say that apart of tartar there was always something little missing to each dish. But it was all tasty.

places.address: Urbanizaci√≥n Coral Beach, N-340, Km. 176, 29602 Marbella, M√°laga, Spain

places.generalDescription: Perched on the edge of Puerto Banus, the Benabola Sky Lounge offers a prime vantage point to take in the iconic harbor, lighthouse, and passing boats. The rooftop terrace provides stunning views of La Concha mountain and the Mediterranean Sea. With its comfortable home-terrace decor, this sophisticated yet relaxed setting is perfect for savoring crafted cocktails and drinks while soaking in the charm of Puerto Banus.

sources.snippet: As you know well, Hotel Benabola and Puerto Ban√∫s are perfect for a holiday, but we don‚Äôt mean just the summer holidays!. It is a fundamental part of us to offer the best services during any month of the year, but we also love special dates, so we‚Äôre going to let you into some secrets for enjoying Valentine‚Äôs Day in Puerto Ban√∫s.
sources.shortName: Valentine‚Äôs Day at Puerto Ban√∫s: enjoy the romanticism

places.name: Benabola Sky Lounge Puerto Ban√∫s

reviews.text: Very beautiful view be there when it opens to get the best seats. Very sunny, I recommend bringing a hat. Price range is ok 12-16‚Ç¨ for cocktails, the Martini Pornstar was really good!

If you want a great view over the port with a lovely cocktail in hand, then this is the place to go. There is a 20 euro entry fee, but a free cocktail with that - the cocktails are great. You are on the roof of the hotel basically, so it can be windy and the sun does disappear meaning it can get chilly later on. But still a nice place to go early evening before heading off for your meal, etc.

Fantastic views of Puerto Ban√∫s and a glimpse of the Marbella coastline. The atmosphere? Brilliant. The staff? Absolutely amazing - super helpful and genuinely friendly!
Drinks were spot-on - I ordered a Whiskey Sour and, no joke, it was one of the best I've ever had. No entry fee either, which is always a win.
It was so good we ended up staying way longer than planned. If you're in Puerto Ban√∫s, this place is a must-visit

places.address: C. Benabola, bloque 3, Planta 7, Nueva Andaluc√≠a, 29660 Marbella, M√°laga, Spain

places.generalDescription: Restaurante Skina is an upscale dining venue in Malaga, known for its creative tasting menus featuring seasonal Andalusian ingredients and an extensive wine list. The restaurant is part of the gastronomic capital of Malaga, which boasts more Michelin stars than any other city in Andalucia. Skina's cuisine pays tribute to the multicultural and vibrant gastronomic tradition of southern Spain, showcasing the closeness and seasonality of its ingredients.

sources.snippet: Romantic dinners in the best restaurants: Marbella has an excellent gastronomic offer, including the prestigious Skina (2 Michelin stars) or Le√±a Marbella, by the renowned chef Dani Garc√≠a. Many of these restaurants prepare special Valentine‚Äôs Day menus, where tradition and avant-garde merge in each dish, creating a unique gastronomic experience.
sources.shortName: a romance on the Costa del Sol

sources.snippet: When you go, try Japanese cooking at Ta-Kumi, get local Andalusian cuisine at places like Lobito de Mar and Bibo (both by chef Dani Garc√≠a) or snag a table at the famous two-Michelin-starred Skina, by Marcos Granda.
sources.shortName: Marbella luxury: Plan a romantic getaway to Spain‚Äôs most glamorous city

places.name: Restaurante Skina

reviews.text: I shared a truly unforgettable dining experience this evening at Restaurante Skina in Marbella, Spain, one that left us feeling inspired and energized. From the moment we walked in, every aspect of our visit was exceptional, with bold flavors, meticulous attention to detail, and outstanding service all coming together to create a truly exceptional experience. Thank you!

We chose the chef's tasting menu with the wine pairing. The opening non-alcoholic aperitif and snack in the separate wine room was a nice touch. Then we moved into the chef's kitchen where you stand at an island and are presented with another set of appetizers. They were mushroom themed with plenty of shaved truffle varieties. Also a unique part of the experience as this happens before you are seated at your actual table. The courses and pairings are served at well timed intervals. Positives: filling meal, amuse bouche was 5 or 6 bites, dishes really intimated art and were delicious, wine pairing had a wide range of Spanish varietals. Cons: Upon being seated we told the server of a shrimp allergy and he repeated each 3 subsequent visits to the table that this should've been communicated prior; we understood this and said we could've gone the a la carte route if modifications could not be made. Instead the chefs were able to accommodate, but the server kept reiterating how we should've let them know - reinforcing a feeling of guilt. After the bread course and crumbs were quite literally all over the table, the restaurant did not remove these (despite having asked) until before the dessert course. Attentiveness seemed to taper off toward the end of the meal as the staff could be seen chatting amongst themselves. Overall the food was incredible, presentation was stunning, and it's worth a visit.

*Intimate Fine Dining at Its Best*

Our experience at this 2 Michelin star seafood restaurant was truly unforgettable. From the moment we walked in, we felt incredibly welcome and valued. What made our evening truly special was having the entire restaurant to ourselves, creating an intimate and exclusive atmosphere that allowed us to fully immerse ourselves in the culinary journey.

The highlight of the evening was witnessing the chefs at work, watching them skillfully prepare each dish with precision and care. This behind-the-scenes look added an extra layer of appreciation for the artistry and craftsmanship that went into every bite.

The seafood was exquisite, with each dish showcasing the chef's creativity and expertise. Every bite was a masterclass in flavors, textures, and presentation. The service was impeccable, with our every need attended to with warmth and professionalism.

This dining experience was more than just a meal; it was a celebration of fine cuisine, impeccable service, and personalized attention. If you're looking for a special night out that feels like a private affair, look no further. We left feeling sated, impressed, and already planning our next visit.

places.address: Av. C√°novas del Castillo, 9, 29601 Marbella, M√°laga, Spain

places.generalDescription: El Grill de Marbella Club is a renowned fine dining restaurant with a typical Spanish decor and a prominent large grill at its center, emitting delightful charcoal aromas and creating a cozy tavern-like ambiance. It attracts both locals and hotel guests, offering Mediterranean cuisine that blends traditional local dishes with Greek, Italian, and Lebanese influences. The restaurant features an elegant atmosphere and a summer terrace for candle-lit dinners surrounded by greenery.

sources.snippet: Situated within the lavish premises of the Marbella Club Hotel, The Grill stands as a paragon of splendor and an epitome of world-class dining. It is more than just a restaurant; it's a celebration of luxury, romance, and culinary innovation, all wrapped into one unforgettable experience. As you step into the restaurant, you'll find yourself surrounded by the charm of an open-air courtyard, caressed by the soft Mediterranean breeze.
sources.shortName: (Tip) The most Romantic Restaurants in Marbella 2025

sources.snippet: Considered to be one of the finest restaurants in Marbella, and a personal favourite of mine, the Marbella Club Grill is an exceptional restaurant. In the summer the restaurant moves outside onto the spectacular terrace surrounded by beautiful gardens. Before the meal enjoy a few drinks in the cocktail garden to begin the evening and then be lead to your table to choose from the innovative and ...
sources.shortName: Best Restaurants for a Romantic Dinner for 2 in Marbella

places.name: El Grill de Marbella Club

reviews.text:
Style and Character: The restaurant's Andalucia chic style is a perfect blend of traditional elegance and modern sophistication, creating an atmosphere that feels both welcoming and refined. The beautiful gardens surrounding the restaurant add a touch of natural beauty to the dining experience.

Food and Drink: In a Grill Restaurant like this, one must indulge in the grill dishes, and the t-bone steak I had was truly exceptional.

Summary: Overall, El Grill de Marbella Club is a delightful find, with a charming terrace that adds an extra layer of enjoyment to the dining experience. From the lovely ambiance to the delectable grill dishes, the El Grill de Marbella Club is a must-visit for anyone looking for a memorable and satisfying dining experience in a beautiful setting.

Outstanding. Exceptionally high quality food, lovely setting and very friendly staff.
Definitely recommended. Price point is high but worth it for a memorable meal.

Exceptional Dinner at El Grill de Marbella Club
Amazing atmosphere, outstanding service, and perfectly cooked food. The quality of the ingredients and the attention to detail really stood out. A classic spot that truly lives up to its reputation we'll definitely be back.

places.address: Av. Bulevar Pr√≠ncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe, s/n, 29602 Marbella, M√°laga, Spain

places.generalDescription: Centro Cultural Cortijo De Miraflores, situated on the outskirts of Marbella, is a hub for art, culture, and education. The center offers a diverse range of cultural experiences such as concerts, theater performances, and art exhibitions. Additionally, it houses a library and a cafe while boasting a spacious garden for relaxation.

sources.snippet: The Cortijo Miraflores cultural center, the Oil Museum (housed in a 1704-built home), the Ralli Museum (which is dedicated to the dissemination of Latin American and European contemporary art) and Avenida del Mar (which houses a collection of bronze sculptures by Salvador Dal√≠).
sources.shortName: Marbella luxury: Plan a romantic getaway to Spain‚Äôs most glamorous city

places.name: Centro Cultural Cortijo de Miraflores

reviews.text: I have been to varios cultural events here over the years.  Today it was for the presentation of a map of the surrounding mountains - Sierras Blanca y Canucha

Farm House and mill that dates back to the 18th century. Nowadays is a study centre and its were the local history archives are based. You can still see the old mill machinery and there's also a museum were some Roman items found in Marbella area can be seen. These two saints can be found in one of the walls. Any guesses who they are? üòÉ
Esplendido

places.address: C. San Pedro de Alcantara, 10, 29601 Marbella, M√°laga, Spain

places.generalDescription: Zozo√Ø is a renowned restaurant in Marbella's Old Town, offering a diverse culinary experience. The menu features classic French and Italian cuisine alongside indigenous Spanish dishes, including traditional hearty options and avant-garde creations. The establishment is known for its charming Andalusian setting and two lovely courtyards. With Belgian owners who have been part of the Marbella community for years, Zozo√Ø presents an unforgettable blend of Mediterranean flavors using the freshest ingredients.

sources.snippet: Zozoi is one of those restaurants in Old Town Marbella that foodie locals in the know will say is a firm favourite; they open every day except Tuesday's for dinner. A reservation is always a requirement at least 24 hours in advance, especially in times where capacity is limited. Find the menu (also with delivery options) in the attachments tab on this page.
sources.shortName: Best Restaurants for a Romantic Dinner for 2 in Marbella

places.name: Zozo√Ø

reviews.text: Very nice place, the terrace is so lovely and cozy. The snails were great! The scallops were amazing, especially the sauce. Burrata was good but green tomatoes were really hard so I didn't finish my dish. Be ready that it's not a cheap place, however, the food is worth it. The waitress was really friendly and attentive. A good place for a date night.

A Wonderful Dining Experience at Zozo√Ø!
From the moment we arrived, the service at Zozo√Ø was exceptional warm, attentive, and genuinely welcoming. The staff made us feel right at home, and every detail was handled with care. The food was absolutely delicious-full of rich flavors, beautifully presented, and clearly made with high quality ingredients. Each dish was a delight!

The atmosphere of the restaurant was vibrant yet relaxing, with a charming and cozy vibe that added so much to the experience. Everything was spotless and well-maintained, which really stood out and made the entire evening even more enjoyable.

Highly recommended for anyone looking for amazing food, excellent service, and a beautiful setting. We'll definitely be coming back!

The food is so good at Zoi Zoi. The cocktails list is really great, tried a few cocktails and they were really amazing. They came in a bag with Casa lime and ginger really nice. Also the purple cocktail I can't think what it's called with violets was absolutely amazing.

The starters for 2 is an amazing dish. You have a variety of different tappers from the main menu. All of which were absolutely stunning a really really great choice.

situated in the Oldtown, Zoe is one of the best restaurants in Mob, absolutely amazing atmosphere the garden Terrace was full, but still enough space to breathe in a really great ambience .

The staff are very friendly. The services is amazing. There is nothing that they won't do the service to the table is absolutely superfast.

We had the steak of the house, cooked in jack Daniel sauce, which is cooked to perfection. Really amazing dish, serve potatoes and salad.

The curry was prawns was an absolute delight, really tasty, and just cooked a perfection .

places.address: Pl. Altamirano, 1, 29601 Marbella, M√°laga, Spain

places.generalDescription: Playa los Monteros is a semi-urban beach located on the outskirts of the city, offering visitors a peaceful and serene environment. The beach features fine white sand stretching over 1,476 feet of coastline, making it an ideal spot for relaxation and sunbathing. It is popular for water sports such as windsurfing due to its great waves. Additionally, the beach provides various amenities including showers and beach bars.

sources.snippet: Just 5-10 minutes out of the resort (you can easily get a taxi) is Los Monteros Beach. This idyllic long stretch of sand affords you wonderful views all the way over to Gibraltar. Los Sardinales is a fabulous restaurant (and amazingly well-priced for the quality of the food) right on the beach, and if you pre-book the corner table you‚Äôll be in the prime position to propose just as the sun drops below the horizon.
sources.shortName: The Perfect Proposal Destination: Romance in Marbella

places.name: Playa los Monteros

reviews.text: We came here in november. A very calm, clean, relaxing beach. You can also spot some sanderings running along the shore!
Awesome beach.  Prefect lounge chairs
Great beach for the water sport enthusiasts,  kite and windsurfing, small wave learner surfing. Great beach bars

places.address: Spain

places.generalDescription: Playa de Nag√ºeles, also known as Rocio de Nag√ºeles, is a narrow stretch of sand with stunning mountain views and a relaxed atmosphere. It is centrally located near cafes and hotels, making it convenient for visitors. Situated on the exclusive Golden Mile of Marbella, this beach is renowned for its natural beauty and the famous Embarcadero, a bridge over the sea that transforms into a beach club in the summer.

sources.snippet: Playa de la Fontanilla or Playa de Nag√ºeles are perfect options to enjoy the sea with your partner. Walking along the shore on a sunny day is a comforting experience.
sources.shortName: a romance on the Costa del Sol

sources.snippet: Playa de Puerto Ban√∫s: This beach is located in the exclusive Puerto Ban√∫s marina and is a great place to people-watch and enjoy the atmosphere.
sources.shortName: Things To Do in Marbella for Couples

places.name: Playa de Nag√ºeles

reviews.text: Beautiful soft sands, not too busy, good vibes, water is clean

Located on the stunning Golden Mile is this lovely stretch of sand, during a walk along the paseo maritimo, from porto banus to Marbella, there are many beaches like this one to visit, we also love the free toilets scattered along the coastline.
Beautiful beach..! Pretty empty and the view is amazing.

places.address: 29602 Marbella, Spain
